snippet: The age old Anglo-French rivalry has resurfaced at the Olympic Games with French claims Britain's cyclists might have cheated. It has given the British a chance to indulge in one of their favorite sports: making fun of the French.
abstract: The age old Anglo-French rivalry has resurfaced at the Olympic Games with French claims Britain's cyclists might have cheated. It has given the British a chance to indulge in one of their favorite sports: making fun of the French.

headline.main: Olympics Entente Between Britain and France Not So Cordiale
